mapper.sql: attr_cd, catepak_cd, company_cd, priority_order_cd, attr_value, flg
mapper.insert:
insert into priority.work_priority_order_catepak_attribute (attr_cd, catepak_cd, company_cd, priority_order_cd, attr_value, flg) values
(#{list.attrCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.catepakCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.attrValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.flg,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into priority.priority_order_catepak_attribute(company_cd,priority_order_cd,attr_cd,attr_value,flg,catepak_cd) select company_cd,priority_order_cd,attr_cd,attr_value,flg,catepak_cd from priority.work_priority_order_catepak_attribute where company_cd=#{companyCd} and priority_order_cd=#{priorityOrderCd}

insert into priority.work_priority_order_catepak_attribute(company_cd,priority_order_cd,attr_cd,attr_value,flg,catepak_cd) select company_cd,priority_order_cd,attr_cd,attr_value,flg,catepak_cd from priority.priority_order_catepak_attribute where company_cd=#{companyCd} and priority_order_cd=#{priorityOrderCd}
